snippet.title: GROSS Trailer
snippet.description:
Tower Defense / First Person Shooter coming to Steam January 2023.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1647420/GROSS
If you enjoyed this trailer, please head over to Steam to try out the Demo and add the game to your wishlist.

Huge thanks go out to the most patient of all wives, to everyone encouraging and supporting me and to all my beta testers.

Special thanks to Davis Henry who allowed me to use his amazing version of the irish folk song "the parting glass" (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZzeoLk2SUT4).

 #unity3d #steam  #towerdefense
